Articles.Content:
I'm trying to figure out if it is more efficient to convert Karbonite on the surface of a body and then lift the lfo into space, or lift up the karbonite and convert it in a gas station?

I wondered if anyone had any info, I'll try to work it out on my own. I dont get to actually play that much, as I'm watching my kids, but think about future plans, hence why I can't just boot up the game and figure it out....

Edited February 28, 2015 by MoridinUK
prefix

First off, I'm pretty sure this should be in Add-ons, preferably on the Karbonite thread.

However, in answer to your question, it's much more efficient to convert on the surface.
Thanks for the answer, sorry for being misplaced...
